评论概述: Awesome sweatshirt zippers terrible three out of five were broken
评论详情: I loved these sweatshirts that’s why I bought 5 of them. However 3 of the 5 had broken zippers. Amazon demanded I show them my drivers license I was confused and uncomfortable doing this. I contacted them within days of receiving them. Long story short Amazon will not help me with this issue they told me I had to contact the company I tried doing that nothing worked nothing I tried to find nor what Amazon provided. So I am now stuck with 3 expensive sweatshirts that I can’t use because Amazon was no help. I have been treated very unfairly by Amazon and I was hoping the company would replace them but no way to get a hold of the company. Buyer beware. It will cost me 30.00 or more to have the zippers replaced. I am very sad about this because I love the sweatshirts. If it weren’t for that I would have given them 10 stars. Shame on you Amazon If the selling company reads this please contact me to help thank you

It's so warm and soft! I wear this at work and its very comfy. I'm 5'3 and got the size large; which was a bit big for me but I love oversized hoodies so totally fine by me! If you're looking for a hoodie that keeps you warm in really cold weather I highly recommend this one.

Material is so soft, comfortable & great quality. Thick enough to keep warm but not too thick to feel like I’m suffocating. I’m 5’2 & have a bigger chest so I tend to lean towards medium to large hoodies, so I got this in a medium for a slight oversized look & I’m glad I did. It’s the perfect size & I could probably even go with a small for the look I want. I’ll definitely be buying this in more colors as long as the quality remains the same after I wash it.
When I got the sweatshirt it had Bobbi pins in the pocket and it smells like girls perfume I don't know but I'm a little grossed out
Don’t waste your money It’s so uncomfortable bulky I hate the shoulders bc they drop down The material is thick I feel huge in it I love the Hanes which is half the price and fits beautifully
I like this zip up better than the sweatshirt. It’s very comfortable and decent quality material. I think this should hold up a long time. I would purchase another one.

I love this hoodie so much - it’s the perfect style for an oversized zip up sweatshirt. The fabric/material feels very durable and well-made, this thing does not feel cheap. Zippers can be kinda sticky when zipping up but overall great hoodie.
I’ve ordered the sweatshirt no zipper option before and loved it but this one was very disappointing . The zipper is cheap and sticks .
fits great
Nice quality material, super soft and warm. However the zipper is garbage. It constantly gets stuck and separates. I would not order again.

The zipper is very stiff, difficult to zip up. The facing material inside is not attached to anything and flops out unless the sweatshirt is zipped up. Material is soft and comfortable, definately oversized, so order a size smaller. I would NOT purchase again.
Nice zip up hoodie. It is super soft and very thick. Great quality and exceeded my expectations. Will be buying another one for my teen.

This is one of the items I was most skeptical about in terms of quality that I ordered but it's very accurate to the picture. The material feels thick and nice, it looks properly sewn and is higher quality than I was expecting so I said "no complaints" as I zipped it up and the zipper snagged twice..."I have a complaint....". Please add better zippers to this ya'll I know this is going to breakdown swiftly.

I put this sweatshirt on and instantly fell in love. Wasn’t wild about the nutmeg color but it is so soft and so thick so I was going to keep it. Until I tried to zip it up and the zipper is awful and sticks. I recall seeing another person commenting on the bad zipper. Please upgrade the zipper and this would be an amazing sweatshirt!!! I returned it because I have no time for tricky zippers.

This is the perfect oversized hoodie. It’s got a heavy material that keeps you warm but it’s not overly bulky that it holds you down. It was a great value for the money, it was on sale when I purchased it. So chic and in style too!!! The zipper is kind of cheap, but I haven’t had any issues so far! Recommend!!!
Not as expected After one wash it loose the quality looks so poor
My new go to! So warm, cuddly soft and perfect!

I needed a new hoodie for fall so I bought this one after reading the reviews. What I like about this hoodie is it's black, the material is thick and cozy. It keeps me warm on cooler days.  Overall, I’m delighted with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to anyone in need of a versatile hoodie. Whether you're heading out for a walk or just relaxing indoors, this hoodie has got you covered.
The fabric is good, feel cozy but the appearance of the sweater looks cheap.
Love this! True to size and worth the money spent.
Def oversized. Both of my daughters have this jacket now. Super cute and thick! They wear them almost everyday.
The only reason I gave 4 out of 5 stars is that the zipper is tough to operate.  I fixed it by rubbing it with candle wax. that worked.  Its a good quality hoodie, thick and comfortable.

评论概述: Sent wrong size but looks nice
评论详情: I ordered a small and received an extra small. I got this for an upcoming surgery to have as a baggie sweater but I guess not. No time to return it. Very disappointed with that.

The hoodie is very soft and I thought I'd be ordering more until I tried it on. It's not just oversized, it's huge! The shoulder seams were half way down my arm. Then I checked the size chart and an xsmall is a bust size 43!  I'm a 33 and was swimming in this. It's a nice product but too oversized for me.
The fit was great, it was soft and comfy and after 4 months, the zipper broke :( I could tell the zipper wasn't made with quality parts when I first got it, but thought it would hold up

评论概述: Not sure what is up with the Black Grey hoodie
评论详情: I love these hoodies in general and have 6 colors. My favorite color wise is the black grey however, my first one, the zipper broke with in the 2nd month. I went ahead and order another one and this time, the zipper broke within the first month.  All my other ones I've had for over a year and the zippers are fine. Yes the zipper is cheaper and takes a little of getting used to zipping them different than other sweatshirts, but they still work. The black grey ones for some reason break.The sweatshirts are warm, soft on the inside and have a cute oversized look so I do recommend them in other colors

This is the second one I purchased. This one for my sister in law. She loved hers too. These hoodies are super soft and comfy. They are also cuddly warm. I bought the yellow and light blue and the colors are beautiful. Stay true to your size, they are roomie. I have had my first one over a year and it still looks brand new. Nothing I don't  like about this " jacket"! In sale now, gotta get one!
Shipping was quick and the quality of the is great. I bought an extra small and it is very large on my 5’4 frame. Definitly size down.
It’s actually very good quality, I didn’t expect thats
My daughter hates a coat! I bought this so she has at least something to wear. It really nice quality and warm. She loves it and doesn't give me grief about wearing it.

This hoodie is everything I wanted and more! It’s so cozy and warm without being too bulky. The material is soft, and it doesn’t itch like some hoodies do. I also love the color and how it pairs with jeans or leggings. Perfect for layering in cooler weather. I’ve worn it several times already, and it’s quickly become one of my favorites.
A nice thick warm

I’m a hoodie connoisseur and have a hoodie for all occasions. This is, by far, the best hoodie-for-cold-weather I’ve ever owned! It has the perfect thickness, it lays well on the body, is incredibly comfortable, and washes extremely well. It has quickly become my favorite Chicago winter hoodie!  HIGHLY recommend!

I was very surprised at what high quality material this is made out of. It is heavier than most sweat jackets. It is very soft and seems to run a bit larger in size. I would recommend purchasing, although the price is higher, I feel it is worth it.

评论概述: Worth it!! Quality & value, great oversized fit!
评论详情: Really great sweatshirt - perfect oversize fit! I'm approx 10/12 women's sizes and bought a Large in the heather grey. It has a nice "boyfriend" type oversized fit w/ good sleeve length, (can pull my hands up into sleeves easily, but the sleeves don't hang down over my hands either), overall length, (hits mid-butt on me - 5'5"), and perfect drop shoulder seams. Very soft inside & out and keeps me warm. No problems so far w/zipper that I've seen in other reviews. Happy w/my purchase & bought @ Black Friday deal price, so def worth $26 + change! The only minor suggestion would be that I wish they would make the pockets deeper - like the place where you put your hand in could be a smaller fit, extra loose for small hands and shallow for keeping your phone/might slip out easily.
Love the vibrant color.  The only problem is my granddaughter loves it too.  So, it’s now hers. 🤣
Great quality for the price and is very thick and warm as well as stylish.
Great thick jacket warm and the size was perfect
This is super thick fit perfect.
Sleeves were short and the interface lining  doesn’t lay flat.  Not comfortable.
WORTH EVERY PENNY! it is soo soft which surprised me most how comfortable it was. I wanted it over sized so I sized up to a large when I’m normally a medium
The zipper broke after 2 wearings and I’m not able to return it anymore unfortunately.
This zip up jacket is great for everyday use. It's lightweight, doesn't get fuzzy or fade from washing and it's very warm.

评论概述: Very good material, super comfortable and soft and the price is very good
评论详情: I recently purchased a drawstring zip-up hoodie for the fall season, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This hoodie fits perfectly, hugging my body in all the right places without feeling restrictive. The design is both stylish and functional, making it a versatile addition to my wardrobe.  One of the standout features of this hoodie is how incredibly soft it is on the inside. The fabric feels luxurious against the skin, providing warmth and comfort that is perfect for those chilly autumn days. Whether I'm lounging at home or out running errands, this hoodie keeps me cozy without sacrificing style.  In terms of price, I believe it offers great value for the quality of material used. It feels durable and well-made, which gives me confidence that it will last through many seasons to come.  Overall, I highly recommend this drawstring zip-up hoodie for anyone looking to stay warm and stylish this fall. It's a fantastic investment that combines comfort, quality, and a great fit!
Love it... very warm and thick

评论概述: Comfy and warm with great quality
评论详情: I bought 2, one for me and one for dear friend for cold wet weather at the beach. The warmth was instant and the softness made the wet, cold weather almost disappear. I actually looked forward to being able to wear it!

I love this jacket it’s big and keeps you warm. I got it in a large wish I could have got it in a xlarge because I like my hoodies to be a lil longer but it’s fine. I’m 5’5 and 146 lbs if that helps . Good quality will be buying more in different colors!

When I ordered this hoodie it had such great reviews that I was excited to get it. I ordered it in sky blue. I love blue and the color it appeared on the screens I looked at was consistently the same, almost appearing a light periwinkle. When it arrived, I found myself looking at a light blue sweatshirt, but it was so soft and I like any blue, so I kept it, looking forward to wearing it as it got colder. I wore it a couple times and was so frustrated with the hood which just did not feel right. After its second wear, I inspected it closer. Something was clearly not right. The hood was not sewn right. There is so much material in the part folded on that it never lays right. I turned it inside out and looked at the hood. It laid so nicely. When I flipped it back though, the hood was not right again. It is as if the hood was sewn on backwards with more material in the inner hood  than the outer hood. I had passed the return date so could not return it. Fast forward to now, about a year later. I have only worn it three times, even thought I love how soft it is. The hood is too uncomfortable frustrating.
I’m cute and dressed for winter now.  It’s hard to find one that’s not too thin at a good price.  I also ordered one in white.
Love love love!!! Soft, really black ..got a large, I am 170lbs and it is perfect for over my scrubs
This type of material has that material that if you were to wear a black shirt you will have so much lint on it if you were to wear with this sweater. Not great quality! But it’s cute
Put it on and couldn't get it to zip up.  Metal zipper snags on itself and feels like the teeth have sharp edges.
Very comfy, great color, fits as expected!

Sizes are true.  Material thick and soft.  I always wash new clothes before wearing them.  Fabric softener cleared out the initial stiffness when received.  It also washed quite nicely.Some folks complained about the zippers sticking.  I used some candle wax on the zipper after it dried and it works just fine.Good price, fast delivery.
Perfect fit. Love the looseness. Soft material. Great product for the price.
Great sweatshirt. Does run quite large. Got a medium and there is plenty of room,

I got a large and it was huge. Ordered a small and it was perfect (maybe even a little too big still), BUT I washed it and it shrunk a lot! Too short now :( So, get your usual size - itll be too large when you try it on, but then itll shrink and be good.

评论概述: High quality very thick feels expensive
评论详情: 145lbs 5’4 38D size large -UPDATE: couldn’t get the zipper to work when I wore this in the rain :( it’s so thick and warm, I could’ve gotten a medium but it’ll be more comfortable if I’m wearing a sweater underneath (although I would get way too hot) I’m keeping this even tho I live in a warm state. It’s so soft and cozy I hope it doesn’t attract lint or cat hair. Will update if it does.
I’m usually an xl in women’s tops (38DD) but I got this in a large since it’s oversized. It was still too big. It actually fits my husband who wears an XL.
These oversized sweatshirts were honestly described and fabric is nice quality for warmth. Very pleased with fit. Ordered 2 sizes. Kept both! Very pleased.
La talla es un poco grande pero de todas formas me encantó, el material estupendo.

I would buy again. Soft and comfy.
I love this sweater!! it fits me so well and is very thick and made of good, soft material!
Love this jacket.

I loved this sweatshirt so much that after I received it.. I bought another one in a different color! So happy and pleased with this purchase. I'll probably order again in other colors. -- ** I am curious to know if you sell sweatpants to match in this same comfortable material???
I got a size XL The jacket is thick, very soft material, the hood is oversized which i like! The arm length could have been longer but overall good quality

I like this sweatshirt. I am 5"6",170 lbs, and have those broader shoulders. I can get hard for tops to fit correctly no matter what type of top /jacket it is. I ordered a large since it was considered oversized. It fit perfectly....and I would have given it 5 stars but I have to wash it a few times and see how the color holds up. but for fit and comfort....I will be buying a few more colors.
The quality of this jacket is nice, I ordered the rust color but it isn’t rust.. it’s a pinkish orange!

Absolutely love this hooded zip-up sweatshirt Great quality, doesn’t shrink, no fading of the color They are really nice and wash well Went and bought more in other colors and truly great quality and price
very good quality considering the price the only downside is the zipper is somewhat stubborn sometimes but all around good quality for the price
Better quality than I expected. Nice thick fabric and super comfortable! I will buy it in other colors !

This is priced much lower and higher quality than designer brands that you find in store or oonline. The quality meets or exceeds exceeds all of my name brand sweatshirts. It is thick, soft, and washes well. There are other ones just like it on Amazon but I like this one the best since it is 50% cotton. I know their is mention of the zipper but I have multiple colors of this and all the zippers work seamlessly. Some other people mentioned the arms being short (they must have go go gadget arms). I am 5'4", 135 and have very long arms and the arms are perfect. I actually think other brands make the arms way too long, where I have to roll them up. If I could afford it, I would buy this sweatshirt in every color. I won't buy any other zip up hoodie from now on.
I absolutely love this jacket it’s super comfy to wear around the house and lounge in. I bought I big size and the material is super soft.
Excelente material y calidad 👍
